review_content: Cor amarelo dourado, ligeiro laranja, espuma branca, densa e persistente. Aromas a fruta, citrinos, notas florais, toque de banana, fruto tropical maduro, fermentação. Boca com textuta, cremosidade e ao mesmo tempo leveza, muito delicada e elegante, fruta exótica, amargor no ponto, persistente.
Troebel geelkleurig bier met een dikke witte fijne schuimkraag. Kruidige graangeur. Niet de verwachte banaan. Heerlijk romig mondgevoel en tegelijk verfrissend.

500ml bottle from Isetan, Kuala Lumpur. Poured a slightly hazy golden orange colour with a short-lived, fizzy white head. The aroma is malt, light funky banana yeast. The flavour is light acidic banana, with a light, crisp, slightly watery, fizzy, light clove spice, light dry yeasty palate. Medium to light bodied with average carbonation.

Hazy, orange-golden with a good white head.
Aroma: Relatively faint. Mostly malt: Hay, cereal, honey, wheat. A bit of yeast.
Mouth: Mild taste, mostly sweet and only a moderate hoppy dryness.
Medium body, low carbonation.
(Can) hazy, bright yellow colour with a tall white head; aroma of metal, jam; simple, balanced flavour with a long, light bitter finish
Slightly hazy, golden with creamy white head. Malty aroma with notes of banana and very little cloves. High carbonation. Medium to low body. Malty flavour, with floreal and fruity notes

Pours a slightly cloudy, deep golden coloration with a medium, frothy head and slightly visible carbonation. Smells of doughy malt, grassy hops and hints of spicy yeast esters, as well as a certain mineral note. Taste is a decent balance of sweet'ish doughy malt, very light spicy/fruity yeast esters of banana and clove, as well as some bitter, grassy hops and a certain mineral note also coming through. Finishes with a medium bitterness and some grassy hops, hints of clove and that certain mineral note lingering in the aftertaste. Soft mouthfeel with a light/medium body and medium/strong carbonation.

This Hefeweizen is seriously lacking in that typical estery yeast character to me, while it also feels somewhat light-bodied and over-carbonated, despite a decent, soft mouthfeel. While some clove is noticeable, there very little banana to be found here, with the flavor profile being dominated by rather sweet malt and grassy hops, as well as a certain minerality. The balance just doesn't work out at all for me here, with this being quite sweet despite lacking in a rich maltiness, the yeast esters being way too weak here, while the grassy, mineral notes are too pronounced for my personal taste. One of the worst Hefeweizens I've ever had, to be honest.

slightly hazy yellow with large white head. 
Smells yeasty and slightly fruity. Taste is Yeast, wheat, some banana and citrus notes with slight mango and grassy edges. Refreshing, medium body and average carbonation. One of my fav wheat beers :)

zapach: zielony banan, zbożowy 
smak: wodnisty, lekko alkoholowy w pierwszym odczuciu, lekko zbożowy, bardzo delikatnie banan, goryczka niska, troszkę słodki

Pas nerveuse cette Erdinger Weissbier. Sur un rythme plan-plan, une douceur certaine et un cocktail aromatique simple, difficile de se passionner pour celle-ci. Une bouteille de 50 cl est d'ailleurs nettement de trop. Le visuel est sur un blond jaunâtre trouble avec une fine mousse blanche à la surface. Nez plat sur le pain avec un léger fruit (banane, pomme). L'attaque manque de caractère et de tension sur le pain, la coriandre, la banane et la pomme. L'ensemble est doux avec un alcool, à 5,3 % aux abonnés absents. La deuxième bouche est à l'identique avec une très légère acidité. L'ensemble est d'une platitude affligeante. J'ai craint l'endormissement sur l'arrière bouche et sur le final, où les arômes perdent un peu plus à chaque instant pour terminer sur du pain liquide. Corpulence et longueur sont très moyennes. Bof.
almond aroma, hazy orance color and a thin head. The taste is very refreshing and smooth, mango and hot fruits taste.

Erdinger (Weißbräu)_03.2022

Złota niemiecka pszenica o puszystej i trwałej pianie. Same piwo wodniste, klarowne, żadnych bananów i goździków. Dosyć słodko. Jest ok, choć moim zdaniem, trochę mało pszeniczna.
It just gets worse every year. Less wheaty, less flavourful, more bland and generic.
Pours slightly hazy yellow with large white head. Yeast, wheat, some banana and citrus notes, grass. Medium body and average carbonation.

16 oz can.  Pours hazy golden with tall, long lasting, fluffy white head, nice lacing and lively carbonation.  Aroma is of yeast, wheat malt, spices and some citrus. Body is medium and slightly crisp.  Wheat malt, yeast, ripe fruit, grassy hops and spices fill the mouth.  Finish is long and spicy. Overall good brew.

* Rating overgezet 2016* Het is een gougkleurig troebel bier met een volle witte schuimkraag. Het heeft een gistachtige en moutige geur. De smaak is moutig, zacht en licht hoppig.

Excellente, belle couleur, une mousse parfaite si reste au verre , un très bon goût malté .

0,5 bottle @ caffe La tazza

Pours light lemonade like color with almost no head.
Strong wheat taste. Well carbonated. Boring taste, not strong. Watery. 

Nije nešto.

Bottle from local Asda.   Amazingly, I don’t seem to have drunk this beer since my records began in 2013.  Here’s putting that to rights.  Has a subtle aroma of wheatabix mixed with banana and a smidgen of tangerine.  Pours a hazy golden yellow with a vivacious white head.  In the mouth theres a brief glimpse of sweet malt, before the wheat esters kick in with banana, bubblegum, vanilla and  a touch of honey.  Finish is bananas with a little spiciness.  Nice, but not as good as I remember it being.

Bottle. Pale golden color with foamy white head. Wheat and yeast aroma. Grainy, wheat taste with hint of banana. Slight wheat sweetness in the aftertaste. Medium to high carbonation. Relatively light body but you can enjoy well balanced wheat flavor. Quite refreshing.

23 ounce glass, draft at Lizardville in Copley, Ohio. Smells grainy. Darker yellow with nice white head. Taste the sweet wheat. Mellow and easy drinking. Little bit of grain and wheat aftertaste. Nice beer for the style. Would drink again. Cheers!

Old rating from 2012 - 500ml bottle, pours light orange with a white foamy head. Aromas & tastes of citrus, banana, clove, bread, hints of spice & wheat. Medium body. Light crisp finish. Very enjoyable

Farbe/Schaum:gelb trüb
Geruch:grasig hefig leicht muffig
Geschmack: hefig leicht Alkoholig. Spritzig im antrunk. Leichter körper

Colore giallo paglierino, torbido; schiuma bianca, compatta, soffice, alta e persistente.
In bocca banana, bubblegum; finale asprigno.

Charcuterie pairing: Black Forest Ham and Emmental 

Erdinger is an institution among wheat beer lovers, and not without reason. Bavaria is extremely well known for its wheat beers. Mostly due to their extreme consistency and (for better or worse) predictability. Bavarian brew laws (Reinheitsgebot), with 500 years of backing, guarantee this. 

Hefeweizens will always carry a fruitier flavoring (which is why they're often paired with an orange slice) and have more hints of coriander than other beers. German weissbiers are less so than Belgian Witbiers, but still carry a flavor that has you dreaming of beer gardens in the spring. And for being a beer in the 5% range, and the strictness of the beer laws, they should have been the one to have the old 'never fills you up, never lets you down' tagline (sorry...budweiser's marketing is always superior). This beer will likely surprise none of my followers, but in case you're a hefeweizen fanatic and you haven't had one, it's definitely something to try as its part of the bedrock of the class of beer.

Zo heurt Weizenbier te zijn 👏🏻 Votsbeer op en
top! De dag erna verzekerd van een frisse zomerbries in den broek. 🐖💨
0,5l bottle. Almost clear golden beer with cloudy head. Aroma has wheat, grain and citrus. Flavor has wheat and grain. Decent.
Bottle at home. Massive head although that’s probably the way I poured it. Nose is rust, blood, banana. Taste is bacon and cloves. Pretty bad.

Oktoberfest is on and it would be remiss of me to not have a few German ales to celebrate. Crisp and clean wheat beer that’s perfect to have with a giant pork schnitzel and that weird boiled cabbage crap the Germans eat.

Bottiglia. Il gusto al naso resta attratto dal frumento. L'intensità olfattiva è normale e la maniera in cui permane è sufficiente. Il mantello birroso superiore è caratterizzato da una schiuma che resiste abbastanza. La grandezza delle bollicine è a grana medio-fine. Il liquido è di apparenza velata. Il colore è giallo dorato brillante. Il corpo è pieno. L'amaro è di media potenza. La forza gustativa è elevata e permane in maniera sufficiente. Le sensazioni boccali finali risultano di pronta beva. Il retrogusto è intenso. In bocca l'aroma è quello di miele, frumento, un accenno di resinoso, agrumi, arancia amara, spezie e pepe bianco.
Pours yellow with a thin white lacing. Aroma of sweetened malt. Taste has honey, slightly floral malt. Palate has grassy nasal notes, slightly sweet malt. Unremarkable but good.

Raczej słabo wypadło, liczyłem na coś lepszego. W aromacie pszenica, trochę gumy balonowej. W smaku trochę bananów i również guma balonowa. Raczej wytrawne. Ładna piana, ale szybko znikająca. Barwa ciemnego miodu, trochę mętne.
Botella de 50 cl. Color amarillo pálido, turbia, espuma blanca abundante y con excelente retención. Aromas a levadura, plátano. Sabor similar, fácil de beber, weissbier de nivel medio, correcta.
Nijakie. Bardziej jak lager niż pszeniczne. Noby świeże, a klarowne, żadnych bananów czy goździkoów. Zakup piwa w lidlu.
Piana beżowa, drobno pęcherzykowata. Barwa złota opalizująca. W aromacie banan. W smaku banan, tosty. Goryczka niewyczuwalna, wysycenie wysokie.

20.09.2020     Pomarańczowe. Z mleczną mętnością. Piana wzorowa i olbrzymia. 
Aromat bananowy. W tle goździk, albo chmiel. Trudno rozeznać.
Wysycenie w normie. Pełnia słodowa. Kwskowość, przyprawowość. Tylko odrobina bananowej słodyczy. 
Orzeźwiające. Przyzwoite piwo.
13.05.2021     Pomarańczowe, klasycznie zmętnione. Wzorcowa piana, której ilość przewyższa ilość piwa. Opada bardzo powoli pozostawiając imponujące firanki na szkle. W aromacie banan nad goździkiem. 
Dużo gazu, pełnia w sam raz. W smaku chyba wygrywa goździk. Na finiszu delikatna goryczka. 
Piwo do bólu klasyczne, ale w tej klasyce idealne.

En copa, cerveza túrbia con una generosa capa de espuma blanca. Aroma a cereales blancos, heno, paja, cereal en grano, plátano maduro, y levadura. En boca, textura espesa y consistente, de carbonatación media y amargor suave. Sabor dulzón a cereales, plátano maduro, presencia de paja y heno en nariz tras el trago, y un fondo de levadura que recuerda al pan. Una Weissbier normalilla, sin nada a destacar pero tampoco nada a criticar, de las Weissbier que se encuentran fácilmente.

Foam foam everywere. I had to wait to line the second half of the bottle. It was not much time. The foam died easily, but a ring around the glassline stayed.

The smell of the foam little bit fruity, mild yeast, but not strong.

First swallow: tasty, a normally hefe weiße.

Foam reborned, the beer borned. The smell filled with fruits (mostly banana) it was fantastic.

APARÊNCIA
amarelo dourado, turvo.
creme branco de boa formação e persistência.
AROMA
cravo, banana e fermento.
SABOR
malte, banana e leve cítrico.
SENSAÇÃO
corpo medio-baixo e média carbonatação.
Opaque amber with lasting head.  Funky, yeasty aroma.  Flavor is slightly spicy and creamy wheat beer feel, with a funky and hop bitter finish.

Pours cloudy straw with active, perfectly white head. Aromas of freshly-cut grass and sliced apple. Smooth yet full mouth feel with moderate body for the ABV with notes of apple, faint mashed banana, a touch of clove and stewed raisins on the finish.

An everyday cheap weissbeer. Fruit, cereal, banana..all the usual flavors. Not great, but not terrible. Not as awfully sweet as Hoegarden weiss. Not as complex and natural as more expensive wheat-beers. Fine, if you're thirsty and the gas station is open.

Cerveza alemana rubia de trigo, de las de toda la vida. Alcohol moderado, cuidado al servirla y preferencia en vaso alto, tipo jarrón.
En lata, aromática y muy agradable, trigo por encima de todo con algunas frutas en segundo plano.
Color amarillo oscuro pero quizá demasiado poco cuerpo, muy transparente, y bastante espuma, servida despacio y con el vaso inclinado para poder hacerlo de una sola vez.
Sabor agradable, quizás un punto por debajo de otras cervezas similares respecto a fuerza y matices. Bastante carbonatada. Muy acuosa, se le echa en falta más presencia. 
Para los días calurosos de verano, muy fría. Hay otras rubias de trigo mejores, va de más a menos.
Everything a great German Wheat Beerhas plus the bottle conditioning and out of this world carbonation.
Pours clear amber with a full, white head.  Aroma is citrus, wheat and light caramel.  Taste is thin caramel, moving to orange and wheat.  Finish is orange, wheat and light caramel.
No le pillo el rollo. Es suave, equilibrada, discreta, pero pasa completamente inadvertida. Le falta personalidad, garra...
500ml bottle purchased at Total Wine Pembroke Pines, FL for $15.99 variety pack 5+1 Very good.

500ml bottle BBE in 9 months. My first Weissbier. Pours a cloudy light orange, large foamy head. Aroma of grain and sweetness, a little fruitiness. High carbonation at first then moderate, moderate body, quite a foamy yet silky smoothness on palate; very nice. Taste of malt, wheat, sweetness, a hint of fruit. Lovely, I think I could like this style.
I think it is a really nice wheat beer, easily comparable with the top ones (Paulaner and Franziskaner). Nice sweet ending.

Slavena-Lux 36,4 lei - 0.5 l
Aromă de cereale , ierburi, banană. Gust de pîine, hamei ascuns, banană cuo amărăciune a hameiului abia detectabilă.

Pours a hazy honey golden with an overly energetic head.......aroma of light banana, metallic.......taste is fair amount of body, wheat grain dominates with its grittiness, touch of clove, banana. quite refreshing.
Eine helle schon leicht gelbliche Farbe. Geruch nach Orange und Hefe. Ein vollmundiges Gefühl. Aromen von Nektar, Orange und Grapefruit.
Cerveza de trigo con un sabor dulce y especiado con toques de miel, buen cuerpo y aromas frutales. Buena cerveza de trigo.

I didn't realize that this is a Hefeweisen since it's just called "Weissbier", and the aroma seems more like a standard Weissbier:  Good German lager yeast with a clean malt character, but no clove/banana component.  Slightly hazy pale yellow with a very enthusiastic white, foamy, *sparkly* head.   Nice malted wheat flavor with a bit of pepper spiciness up front.   Body starts off slightly creamy but seems to strangely turn watery mid-way through.  Good noble hop bitterness balancing the light caramel/honey sweetness.  Finishes clean with a lasting malty taste which is quite nice.  A very refreshing and tasty German wheat beer.

Aroma of wheat, banana, fresh fruit, cereal grains and bread. Pours hazy golden liquid with a large soapy white head. Mild taste with some sweetness, flavour of wheat, banana, malt and cereal grains. Full body with a very creamy texture, very drinkable. Somewhat lacking in the flavour department.

(500ml bottle, Berlin. 25 Apr 2020)
AROMA: light grain/wheat, yeast, biscuit, some perfume, not much of the banana/cloves that some wheat beers have
APPEARANCE: tall white head, hazy dirty yellow, foam does linger and leaves a fair amount of residual
TASTE: tastes like a hearty lager, grainy, green, grassy, leaning towards non-roasted grain/wheat, a hint of citrus at first but builds up as the beer warms up, some coffee hidden underneath on the finish, 
PALATE: quite sparkly and fizzy, so a bit biting on the front with fizz persisting for a bit. approaching medium body, after the sharpness, there is some roundness and oiliness,  

OVERALL: nose is light and underwhelming but nuanced, good looking beer, mouth feel is a bit too sharp for me, flavors focus on citrus and grass and light grain. It is a quality beer that tastes like it was made well, but the bite/astringency is a tad too much for me. As it warms up and flattens out, it does get better.
SKÅL, CHEERS, SALUT, KIPPIS, YAMAS, L’CHAIM, PROOST,  SALUTE, KANPAI 🍻🙏😎
Light hazy golden, pillowy white head. Banana, citrus, wheat and some clove. Soft carbonation, light acidity, refreshing pretty ok.

Piana obfita jak to w weizenach, dosyć klarowne. W zapachu delikatna słodycz, pszenica, chlebek i goździki. W smaku i aromacie brak banana, ale za to po wzięciu łyku pojawia się lekka guma balonowa. Tutaj również chlebowość, lekka pszenica, a bliżej finiszu goździki. Dosyć słodko. Jest ok, choć moim zdaniem brakuje charakterystycznego banana i drożdżowości typowych dla weizenów.

Bread and cloves in aroma
Taste is bread. Not a hefe Weiss you'd expect - no banana, little cloves, even hops feel stronger.
Refreshing and thirst quenching industrial weizen

Piana średnia, barwa weizena, ale nieco bliżej zamglenia, klarowności niż mętności. Owocowe aromaty, banan niby jest, ale przede wszystkim brzoskwinie i gruszki, nikłe przyprawy, pojawia sie guma balonowa. W smaku bliżej do pinacolady niż do weizena. Słodowe, i nieco wytrawny finisz. W miarę przyzwoity finisz.
Not usually a weissbier fan, but quite like this one. Light gold in colour with a decent white head. Light flavours and good balance make it a refreshing and easy-drinking pint.

Bottle from Billa
Pours gold with tall white head.
Yeasty and bit of clove on a nose.
Tastes bready, low yeast, low clove, barely any banana. Nope this is not hefeweizen I was looking for.

Robe blonde orangée trouble. Mousse blanche crémeuse très bonne tenue. Arômes banane clou de girofle vanille fruits jaunes agrumes biscuits épices floral. Goût sucré amertume faible. Texture crémeuse. Carbonatation très fine moyennement abondante. 

Classique.
bottle dorata leggero velata schiuma media leggero banana non molto amaro non molto intensa
500ml bottle from Morrisons in Lutterworth. Drunk chilled in a glass, nice foamy head. Classic weissbeer, very bananay
Barwa złocista, piana obfita i średnio trwała. W smaku wytrawne, rześkie, mocno wysycone. Aromat mało intensywny. Mało bananów, goździków brak. Piwo lekkie, pijalne ale mało nut typowych dla stylu.
# 706; 4/2017. Sladší, ovocnější weissbier. Sladké mandarinky, pomeranče, banány. Osvěžující.
Bottle, pours cloudy yellow orange, big white head.  Light body.  Spicy malt aroma, taste is very sweet banana and clove, hops bitterness barely detectable.  Mildly bitter clove finish.  Meh.
Nice weiss beer. I like to drink it with some delicious pasta, pizza and other Italian dishes.
Lots of bread and cereal flavours, quite sweet, Not really my cup of tea I'm afraid.

500ml bottle brewed in Germany at 5.3%. Average-ish, so-so-lasting head, poured carefully mind! Light orange colour, but prevented from being genuinely pale by how murky it is - very. Citrus aroma with rusky wheat which develops in intensity. Moderate-medium carbonation. Initial spritz of orange-citrus hops, then monstrous thick-bodied wheat flavours. If you want wheat in your wheat beer, this delivers, with the hops, normally perhaps quite noticeable for a weissbier, here having their work cut out to shine a light through the thickness of body, and just about managing, cutting through every so often when needed. If you've had weissbiers and thought they didn't deliver the wheat, Erdinger has you covered here. Thick, almost frothy mouthfeel. Only hints of that classic banana yeast though, likewise for the other fruity flavours that a really good weissbier can show - they're there, just about, but this one's really wheat-focused. Lovely, thick, creamy and smooth, especially when the carbonation dies down a little. Perhaps not the most flavourful of weissbiers, but there's no duff flavours in here on the other hand, and it certainly delivers the wheat flavour and mouthfeel, while being decently hopped.
A kapott pontszámhoz képest sokkal jobb az a sör.😁 Most csak azonban ennyi jött össze. alá azért, mert többet vártam .
Estery malts. Dry banana taste. Finish is very bready and wheaty. Not a great example of a wheat beer, but a solid everyday, pedestrian drink.

Has a very nice, sweety, juicy aroma. Very nice appearance, murky, but not very much. Not too sweet of a taste, definetly tastes like an industrial beer weissbier though. Very decent mouthfeel, good for parching your thirst.
Bottle at home. Pours cloudy golden color, white thick head. Aroma of clove, some banana, yeast, malt. Taste is sweet, lightly bitter, clove, banana, some orange.

Hefeweiss de 5,3 % abv.
Mon exemplaire était à 4 mois avant sa date.
Couleur doré moyen, au léger trouble.
Bulles fines, en colonnes droites depuis la paroi, vives.
Mousse blanche, à fins flocons, stable à 2 mm.
Arômes de malt fin, fruits blancs, pointe de melon.
1ère bouche au bel ensemble équilibré, avec du pain de mie au levain.
Arrière-bouche avec une fine compote de pommes, délicate.
2ème bouche à la belle suite avec une jolie modulation.
Arrière-bouche longue, délicate, précise.
Longueur fruitée, avec une grande harmonie du tout.
Jambes fines, assez courtes.
Alcool bien, il peaufine la longueur.
Finale remarquable.
CONCLUSION : une grande bière qui allie finesse, précision et … très
belles saveurs  (9/4/9/4/19)
It is a good beer , but not great , aroma of wheat and yeast and a mild sweet taste.
Pour is golden hazy with a large white head. Very little aroma and flavor. Good beer, but not great. Cheaper wheat beers are just as good and Maisel's is much better for the price.
Best of the Weissbier available. Cloves and coriander evident from first sip. Bubbly on the tongue. If you are a wheat beer fan, you must try this one!

Hazy, almost orange color. Mild banana aroma thanks to the wheat and yeast combination. Too mild flavour. Mild yeast seems okay for me. But with more ingredients, it would be much better. It feels like a bit watery.

This was my first good beer i drink in my life.. Before that i had bad experience with some other "Beers" like "Amstel" , "Heineken" and i was thinking the beers are bad in general.. But i was wrong and the first good beer i drink was this..
Anyway despite my little story this beer is very good for the style and in general.. Is very refreshing with lot of carboration.. The carboration give you the adrenaline you want some momments and you can enjoy more this beer.. The taste is ok.. Nothing impressive but still fine.. Many banana and wheat notes there. The aftertaste is pretty good and leave you some bitterness in your neck..
Overall exist much better "Weissbier" out there that they are less famous but still this beer is very good and its a very safe choice to drink it outside..

Gekochte Früchte und herbe Noten. Die feinperlige Kohlensäure täuscht etwas mehr Substanz vor, als tatsächlich vorhanden ist. Nicht schlecht, aber ganz sicher keine Offenbarung in Sachen Weißbier. Großer Vorteil: Man bekommt es immer und überall, praktisch deutschlandweit.

0.5 l bottle at 'Letj Lembeck's'. Hazy, amber with a medium large, foamy, almost stable, white head. Sweetish, slightly fruity and a bit yeasty-spicy aroma of wheat, some banana and a touch of clove. Quite sweet, malty, slightly yeasty-spicy and a bit fruity taste of banana, wheat, honey and some clove, followed by a short, moderately bitter, slightly yeasty-spicy finish. Medium body, smooth and slightly creamy mouthfeel, average carbonation. Okay Weizen, quite plain and way too sweet.

Bevuta in bottiglia da 50.
Profumo Weiss non troppo intenso. 
Aspetto biondo scuro torbido.
Fg
Bevuta alla spina all'aeroporto di Monaco.  Tipica Weiss.  Buona ma niente di particolare.
Dette er god weiss. Vanskelig å ikke like dette. Uklar, fint skum og den gode hvetesmaken.

Erdinger is the world's largest wheat beer brewery. It is widely available and popular across Germany and the European Union. Erdinger was founded in 1886 by Johann Kienle. Erdinger beer is the best-known culinary product of the city; however, the brewery did not receive its current name until 1949 from its owner Franz Brombach, who had acquired the brewery 14 years earlier. The current owner is Franz Brombach's son, Werner Brombach (since 1975)

Orange hazy appearance with a frothy, but fast dissipating head.
Smell of wheat and yeast. Rather watery taste. There are way better Bavarian wheat beers out there.

Robe orangée laiteuse, belle mousse moyennement tenace et très pétillante. Nez de fruits jaunes, épices, banane. Attaque plutôt épicée, assez ronde mais pas lourde, légère amertume, plutôt désaltérant. Arômes sympathiques.

Kolor żółto złoty, bardzo mocno zamglony. Piana biała, wysoka i bardzo trwała.
W aromacie nie jest tak jak bym oczekiwał, jest lekko i delikatnie. Oczywiście jest banan są drożdże, trochę " rozsypanej pszenicy na betonowej posadzce", ale te aromaty są naprawdę lekkie.
Smak: tutaj podobnie, ale też bez mocy. Nuty banana obecne, ale są dość delikatne i nie zachwycają. W tle akcenty drożdżowe, jest słodko.
Wysycenie wysokie do średniego, pełnia niska do średniej. Momentami piwo sprawia wrażenie wodnistego. Piwo jest gładkie i miękkie.
Cloudy golden colored beer with a big white head. The taste is very good! Easy-to-drink refreshing (summer)beer with a light hint of lemon.

Ang kulay niya ay dark amber na medyo creamy. White head. Creamy. Naiiwan ang bula sa baso. Masarap. Ang aroma niya ay amoy ng wheat na fruity. May lasa ng caramel konti at konting alcohol sa bandang huli. Gargle this beer and you will taste the deliciousness of it.
500 ml bottle from AM PM. A light orange yellow pour with traces of banana and yeast.
Duits weissbier van gerst en tarwe met een iets te waterige smaak. Schuimkraag zakt snel in.
My weissbier classic. It never disappoints. Very smooth yet sparkling, very good in taste.
0.5 l can from S-market Ympyrätalo, Helsinki. A decent wheat beer with a dry ending.
Une bonne alternative à l’eau.  Rien de plus.  / Хорошая альтернатива воды но ничего больше.
Little less wheat contribution than many other wheatbeers. Very easy drinking, tasty and refreshing at the same time.

Im Sommer trinkt man gerne mal ein Weizen und kommt somit dazu die ganzen industriellen Vertreter zu probieren.
Dieses Bier bekommt man europaweit in fast jedem größeren Supermarkt.
Es ist ein nett ausgewogenes, helles Weizenbier mit schönen Fruchtaromen, die zwar nicht allzu sehr beeindrucken, aber doch spürbar sind.
Kein übles Bier für den unproblematischen Weißbiertrinker.
This is a perfectly acceptable beer at the end of a hard-working day.  Not best in class, but a nice easy drinker with a little bit of clove and spice.
Bottle, pours a hazy golden with medium white head. Notes are lemons, banana, spice, fruit, clove, German yeast, and herbals. Light to medium bodied. Solid but not my favorite style.
Bit hazy golden color, creamy white head. Malty, herbal, some banana aroma, malty, bit banana flavor. Smooth, bready finish, light body.
Orange color, middle foam size. Good beer, aroma and taste fit into the style.
It's ok, alot of people rave about this beer and I don't really see it. It's ok I'm not going to say it's bad
Bowl Pub Mokotów: Pozytywnie zaskoczony. Tym bananowym posmakiem bardzo u mnie zaplusował pomimo tego, że ogólnie nie powala.

Fragrance: Not strong, Banana and clove (Something sour).
Taste Wheat with sourness .. weak taste.
In the aftertaste, a little bit of clove and banana.
I'm not getting the typical banana and spice notes of a hefeweizen. Hazy golden color, nice head. Good taste. Pleasant drinking.

Достаточно стандартный вайцен. Шапка держится недолго, пить лучше холодным. По личным наблюдениям мпк всегда прежде чем начать варить заморский сорт у себя, толкает импортное, как сейчас. Такая же строи была с оттенгером 7 лет назад.
Its really week. This was better in the past. Paulaner, HB Weisse and Franziskaner are much better choices. Sad it was my fav :(.

Przeciętniak zapach poprawny mało intensywny w smaku nie dzieje się nic wodniste i płaskie lekko kwaśne o smaku gumy balonowej, plus na pianę i koronkę...
P.S Jeszcze słabsze niż poprzednio, nawet koronki nie było...
P.P.S A tym razem lepsze fenolowe choć dalej wodniste... i jak na pszeniczne niezła koronka...

0.5 bottle
C: cloudy amber
N: metallic note, wheat
P: wheat, cloves, metallic note
É uma cerveja de trigo clássica, que não tem perdido a sua qualidade ao longo dos anos. Boa cor, excelente trago.
Utseende uklar gylden med hvitt skum. Aroma hvetemalt banan. Smak hvetemalt banan sitrus krydder. Fin fylde, fruktig. Smakt Juni 13
Chyba najlepszy waisen jakiego pilem. Szczeze polecam cytrynowa orzeźwiająca nuta. W sam raz na pierwsze gorące dni.
Clear golden pour with mega fluffy head. Tones of bread, banana and malts. Missing some creamyness though
Bottle drunk at home. Clear yellow appearance with big frothy white head. Aroma is wheat and banana. Flavour is wheat, spiced, banana and slight orange.
Decent wheat beer, best when cold. Rather frothy head, but overall a decent beer.
Bière blonde, mousse savoureuse, équilibrée à déguster avant un repas ou sur une terrasse. accompagner avec fromage et charcuterie

( bottle)
Aroma: cloves, malt and banana
Taste: semi-sweet, flavour of clove,  unripe banana , dry herbal finish
Palate: light to medium body, medium carbonation.
Overall: Decent one.
Buena. Aroma atractivo a hojas secas, mimbre. Dorada y turbia, espuma medianamente persistente. Sabor  semi-dulce y suave amargor final prolongado en boca. Textura sedosa, medianamente carbonatada.
En meget velsmagende og blid Weisbier med friske noter af banan. En super dejlig øl til terrassen

Bottle at Beefeater, Farnborough. Spice and herb aroma with a knowing hint of banana. Lightly hazy medium gold. Thick creamy foam head. Light bitter with a sweet and sour edge. Light-medium bodied. Slick. Soft carbonation. Long dry finish. Service level. Certainly not as sweet as some Hefe offerings. 3.4

A decent hef. Cloudy, yellow, and very wheaty.  Bought this for my father cause he leans towards this style if trying something different.  I tasted a few ounces, but not enough to get the full effect.  May buy one to try out solo, but did not seem like anything special, so who knows. There seem to be better ones out there.

Smell - weak, citrus, caramel, malt, pleasant.
Foam- thin, to watery side, half soft,weak citrus, weak sweetness, weak weak bitter sides. Quite large and white foam.
Appearance- bit hazy yellow, orange amber, some carbonation.
Taste- weak citrus, weak sweetness.
I am starting to like wheat beers.
Orta gövdeli kolay içimli Alman Buğday birası, soğuk weizen bardağında içilmesi tavsiye edilir.
Golden hazy color active carbonation finger white foamy head smell citrus banana taste fruit banana hops kinda sour aftertaste nice lacing

Cloudy yellow with a a generous white head. Smells wheaty, summery, creamy and doughy. Tastes very wheaty, biscuits, banana, not too strong, quite sweet. Quite a lot of carbonation, some afternotes of very subtle bitterness. I like it. Good macro weiß.

On tap @Ølbaren - Aarhus Streetfood.
Pours hazy yellow, with thick white head.
Scent: Yeast and banana.
Taste: Wheat, water, sweet.
Texture: High carbonation level. Round.

Weisse beer, with a classic banana scent. Straw yellow color
Birra weisse, dal profumo classico di banana. Colore giallo paglierino

500ml glass bottle, fridge cold poured into weizen glass. £1.80 from Waitrose. Best before 11/2019.

Mass produced German wheat beer. Available in every supermarket or corner shop in Europe. The equivalent in the style of Coca-Cola, in terms of availability and recognition.

An awful lot of smoke from the bottle once the cap is off. Pouring a golden-yellow, very hazy with aggressive carbonation. Bubbles to spare. Two fingers of bubbly white head, with lasting retention. 

Downhill from this point. 

Some clove on the aroma. Graininess. Nothing else. 

The taste follows, no banana notes as would be expected with the style. And the clove taste is minimal. 

Watery mouth feel, considering the carbonation level. A small hit of hoppy bitterness, followed by corny grain. But dies away very quickly. 

Here in the UK this beer generally costs just under £2 for a 500ml bottle. Paulaner Hefe costs £2.50 from a craft beer store or, can be bulk bought for £1.75 a bottle from Majestics...

...Paulaner ever single time.

Hazy golden color with slightly off-white head. Aroma is grainy and a bit floral, not really what you expect from a wheat beer. Taste is a bit more sweet but there is also a sharp bitterness in the middle, feels somehow medicinal. Medium minus body with medium plus carbonation. Not really bad but it's quite far from a legit weizen.

Pivo bljedunjave zute boje,slabije arome,ali solidno velike pjene..
Okus srednje gaziran,bez nekog specificnog okusa..ima boljih psenicnih piva definitivno..

Dåse. Let diset gylden, højt hvid skum ved ophældning, men svinder til næsten igen ting, lav kulsyre. Aroma er lidt kedelig, svag hvede men lidt flad. Smagen er hvede, lidt malt, meget jævn hverken sød eller blomstret. Ganske fin drikkelig hvede.

Aromat pierwszy plan to goździki i inne przyprawy może lekko gałka muszkatołowa. Delikatnie słodki i dojrzały banan. Aromat poprawny i nic więcej jak na ten styl :) Wygląd tutaj akurat jest wzorowo, pięknie zmętnione jasne złoto, trwała drobno-średnio pęcherzykowa piana, ładny lacing. W smaku goździk i banan chociaż dość mało intensywnie. Dość wodniste. Goryczki oczywiście brak jak na ten styl przystało. Lekko kwaśne i cytrynowe. W smaku mocno średnie. Ogólnie to taki Weizen średni aż do bólu wyprany z jakiś większych wodotrysków. Wypić-zapomnieć. Odczucie w ustach: mega mocno gazowane co tutaj akurat na plus, wodniste nawet jak na Weizena. Dla  piwo nie warte wydawania na nie kasy. Za te pieniądze można kupić o niebo lepsze piwo w stylu.
Plain lager type beer with salty notes. Steady foam as the upper level stayed for a long while. Nothing special.

En botella de 500ml varias veces. 

Color amarillo dorado apagado con turbidez medio. Cabeza blanca con retención media. 

Aroma algo de pan y poco más. 

Sabor demasiado tímido, algo de trigo. Amargor escaso, carbonatacion alta, cuerpo medio. 

Bebible pero faltan esteres por todos lados. No tiene personalidad.
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.

0,5l bottle. Pours cloudy golden with white head. Aroma of banana and clove, and not much else. Taste is identical, but with some nice fruitiness and spiced german yeast. Quite a mediocre beer, compared to other german hefeweissens.
Boca 0,33 kupljena u Kauflandu. Pivo mutno zlatne boje, jaaaaako bogate pjene. Okus je umjeren, ne osjeti se alkohol. Simpa pivo

Strohgelb, mäßig trüb mit sehr viel feinporigem Schaum. Minimal fruchtiger, süßlicher Geruch. Spritziger Antrunk mit angenehm dosierter Kohlensäure. Schlanker, latent wässriger Körper. Aromatisch flach ohne jegliche Weißbieraromen. Banane? Nelke? Weizenmalz? Fehlanzeige! Dafür pappige Hopfenpellets im Abgang. Welche Ironie: eines der beliebtesten Weißbiere Deutschlands ist in Wahrheit ein mittelmäßiges Zwickel.
500ml bottle. Hazy dark gold with a foamy white head. Flavors are bread, wheat, banana, bubblegum and citrus with spicy and floral notes. Medium body, moderate to good carbonation, smooth texture.

Es una cerveza con una gran cabeza blanca que no es fácil que se disipe. Es de cuerpo ligero y una carbonatación media. Aroma dulce, afrutado, con notas cítricas. En boca es dulce, se siente la manzana y el limón, y también un poco de levadura. Una muy buena opción.
Aromat wyraźnie bananowy. Piana obfita, drobna. Piwo ciemno żółte, zmętnione. W smaku wyraźne banany, delikatny goździk, trochę kwaskowate-cytrusowo. Mocno nagazowane, pijalne, trochę wodniste.

0,33l bottle. Hazy yellow colour with long lasting white head. Aroma: Citrus, banana a little bit weak. Taste: Has a short sweet malty start with light sourish tones and a very light bitter mouthfeel. A little bit watery the whole feel. Light body with medium carbonation. Long lasting sourish feel.

Õlle on selline jook, et iga uus kord kui klaasi või pudeli suule tõstad, siis leiad midagi uut, sõltuvalt tuhandest-miljonist pisiasjast, mis hetke olukorda mõjutavad. Seega piirdun iga õlle juures selle tekstiga.
德国的艾丁格白啤 德国式的严谨是优势有时也有缺点啊 酒体不算清 但不带沉淀物  入口顺滑（注意这是小麦啤酒！！！） 口感饱满 还是蛮喜欢的 但怎么说呢 质量上乘的德国产品虽然永远会让你满意 可就是缺了一点惊艳 当然惊艳有时就是萝卜青菜各有所爱 请客时我会选它 安全可靠 自己也感觉不赖
0,5l bottle Nürberg- Haze Pale golden with a white head - aroma of grass & fruits - tasted like banana- overall a descent hefe but mainstream

Bottle. 5.3%. Best before 07.19. Pours a hazy, bit pale yellow, with a fluffy, off-white/slightly yellowish head. Slight lacing. Mild aroma; sweetish, slightly fruity, grassy. Sugary hint as it warms. Flavour is sweetish, fruity, bordering grainy, with a hint of yeast. Hints of banana, apple and a remote overtone of cardboard as it warms. Bitter finish, somewhat grainy. Lingering light grassy note and a hint of rubber. Overall so-so; not bad, but kind of boring, and too grainy. 26.10.18.
Dark amber body with thick head. Bready and malty aroma. Malty body has a wheat note. Long lasting finish.

Aromas of malt, yeast and hints ofgrass, banana and spices. Hazy Golden with a White head. Medium sweet and medium bitter. Medium body with average carbonation. Overall a decent Hefeweissen, but a bit on the boring side.
Degelijk goede weissbier. lekker en graan achtige smaak met tonen van banaan en het gebruikte gist. bier is troebel geel en heeft een stevige schuimkraag. -backlog de BierApp-

Nice Weissbier from Erdinger.
Banana notes, yeasty but with a zesty tone (lemon). Refreshing for a Weissbier. Nice body, not too big or heavy. A nice subtly that resonates on the palate and leaves a nice clove/banana aftertaste.
33cl bottle. good carbonation. refreshing. mild acidic and fruity. banana aroma and taste. A very good weissbier.

Not a huge fan of the Bavarian style so perhaps my rating should be disregarded by those who are fans...but this beer is kinda generic and tasteless. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Backlog. Bottles and draft multiple times over the years. Light banana esters and clove aromas on the nose.Good body and banana notes on the palate. Not overly sweet, with some light lemon and peppercorn on the finish.
Kellemes bajor búza. Semmi oda nem illő ízzel, szép habbal. Semmi extra, valahogy így képzelek el egy jó ipari sört.
Ölen smaker som en typisk veteöl. Den är len i munnen, inte så mycket eftersmak, frisk utan att vara fruktig
Bottle. Hazy golden with white head. Less sweet and banana than other Weizen. More dry and malty. Low carbonation.

Bought in 0,5l bottle at a Strandbude on the river Elbe near Nienstedten, hamburg on a cold, rainy afternoon during a bike tour. Poured into a wheat bear glass.

Appearance: hazy golden color with Lacy white Head. CO2 trails in the beers. Color is a 4 or 5 of 8. (0 is clear, 8 is no light penetrates)
Aroma: bananas, yeast, hint of spice, citrus. 
Taste, banana gum, yeast, and lemon. Slight astringency. 
Palate, leaves a nice aftertaste of banana and bread. Fuzzy on the tongue. Long finish. 
Overall this is a beer best enjoyed on a warm or mild day in fall, or on long summer afternoons. An excellent example of Bavarian brewing.
Gotta love a ‘dinger. Hazy straw colour, massive fluffy white head. Lots of lacing. Super fizzy. Taste is light spice, yeast, soap, dry finish. Lovely!

With J, sitting at a bar in Geneva Lake, pores a cloudy gold color with a small white head. Taste very light spice, but grainy and doughy as most wits. Finishes on the same grainy wheaty notes. Not a big hef drinker, but descent. Quaff Score 6 / 10

0,5 bottle. Klasszikus üveg és címke, klasszikus búza kinézet - opálos átlátszatlan világosarany szín, hatalmas fehér aprólyukú - felülről tejszínhab kinézetű - habbal. Friss, citrusos illat, még némi komló is érződik. Ízre klasszikus bajor búza, igazi kalóriabomba, nagyon finoman savanykás, emellett üdítően gyümölcsös, banános és élesztős. Remek bajor cucc... Nagyon ajánlom, és normális áron érhető el! Azóta ahányszor ittam, mindig ilyen megbízhatóan finom volt!
****
Classic bottle and label, classic wheat look - opaque light gold color, with huge white small holes - whipped cream from above - head. Fresh, citrusy aroma, even some hops. It tastes like classic Bavarian wheat, a real calorie bomb, very delicately sour, as well as refreshingly fruity, banana and yeasty. Great Bavarian stuff ... I highly recommend it and it is available at normal prices! Ever since I drank it, it was always so reliably delicious!

It’s my number one favourite beer. Beautiful golden color with fine grains as decoration. The pouring technique is already an art! The aroma of  weiss beer is the second to none with the Erdinger glass. Taste of purity with silky foam.  Life deserves it.
Pours hazy yellow. Light and watery, some wheat, grains, bready, yeasty, metallic. Pretty bland.
Wygląd bardzo dobry, wspaniała piana. Aromat i smak zdominowane przez banany,  piwo raczej lekko słodkie, nie wytrawne. Bez szału, ale można wypić.

Une bière particulièrement agréable à savourer en été après une balade. Alors certes, comme cela a été indiqué, elle reste assez simple mais cette simplicité la rend justement assez facile à boire. Nul besoin de se prendre la tête car elle rempli son objectif : rafraîchir.

Piwo złociste, zmętnione.
Piana ładna obfita i dość trwała.
Aromat słodowy, bananowy, trochę goździków i lekka metaliczność.
W smaku pszenica, banan, goździki.
Dobrze ułożone, orzeźwiające, klasyczne.
Erg smaakvol bier, lichtbitter met smaak van banaan. Een van mn bieren die ik altijd wel in huis heb!
Cerveza rubia de trigo, apariencia turbia, para mi lo mejor el aroma y lo refrescante en el retrogusto, a muy baja temperatura pierde su sabor.

11.2oz bottle. Filtered orange body, lots of rising carbonation bubbles inside meet a massive, foamy, white head. Straightforward, classic, sublime. World Class example of the style, well attenuated, not too sweet. Really well done, hyper sessionable. Great.
Hazy yelloo body with white head. Basic citrus and banana aromas. Similar taste. Medium body and carbonation. Overall a basic weiss, quite flat but drinkable.

Cloudy yellow beer with nice head on top. Aroma has wheat, very malty backbone, some yeast and grass. Light spice maybe. Taste is malty, wheat is there, some spices and yeast. Somewhat harsh. Not fresh at all. Fullish medium body and medium carbonation. From can, should've taken Weihenstephaner...

Heerlijke weizen zoals alleen de Duitsers kunnen maken, alleen per halve liter uiteraard.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Can 500 ml. Darker golden color, minimal head. Sparkling. Wheat malty, a bit astringent taste with some christmas spices. Fizzy with slightly harsh aftertaste.
Cloudy orange with good head, wheat, citrus, light pepper and spice. Decent beer.
80 Р — не брать. Как пиво - ок, как пшеничка - никак, ибо стиль абсолютно не выражен. Необходимо в два раза больше заварки.
0,5 litre Bottle from Tax Free Store in Hamburg Airport. Cloudy orange with white head. Malts, hops, Wheat , sweetness and bready. Nice.

Bottle. BBE Feb 2019; Drank July 2018 - Cloudy yellow in colour. Large foamy white head. Malty; wheaty, grainy. Fruity; citrus fruit. Moderately yeasty. Lightly spicy. Sweet wheaty malty citrus fruity throughout. Refreshing enough. Drinkable but fairly bland wheat beer. (2018-07)
Mooi weizen met veel koolxuur, schuimkraag blijft dus lang aanwezig. Medium body van citrus en gist. Drinkt makkelijk weg.

50cl-fles in Koffiehuis De Hofnar te Gullegem. U: Wazig goudblond met een witte schuimkraag. G: Bleekmout, gist en zoet maïs. S: Moutzoet met een lichte hopbitter. Granen, maïs en gist. Droogtrekkend. M: Doordrinker met medium carbonatie.
Fles 50cl thuis. Romig, banaan, vrij zoet, redelijke balans. Prima te drinken. (6-2011).

Bottle 0.5 L. It's an average but very enjoyable wheat beer. I have to taste it again to write full review... UPDATE: tasted on draught, and i looked after the malt and  the hops. 60% Wheat, 40 Pilsner malt, possibly Hellertau hop. Low IBU, sweet tones with mainly vanilla, banana. Much more intensive taste than the bottled one, enjoyable and refreshing but nothing extraordinary.

Weiss classica, leggera e non molto corposa ma sempre beverina, specialmente nelle calde serate estive. Sentori olfattivi di farina e frumento, al palato di frumento e banana. Sicuramente ci sono (molte) weiss migliori, ma una Erdinger si beve sempre volentieri.

0,5l, plechovka zakoupená v Bille. U tohoto piva mě opravdu zaujala lehkost a dobrá pitelnost. Myslím, že jsem právě objevil nenáročnou pšenici pro lidi, kteří by se tomuto stylu "chtěli naučit" a přitom je to stále pšenice kvalitní! Trochu mi chyběla silnější chuť a libozvučné banánové a hřebíčkové tóny jako například u pšenic od Schneidera, ale i přesto jsem byl velice příjemně překvapen!

Bottle 500 ml ABV 5.3 % from Sainsbury's. Aroma is yeast with hay, dry fruit notes and spices. Pours a hazy yellow-golden body with a big white head. Taste is sweet malts, yeast, hay, banana and spices. Dry palate. Decent weiss but not close to Weihenstephaner or Franziskaner. Too malty.

Piwo jasne, zmętnione, widać że solidnie nagazowane. Bujna biała piana. W aromacie banany i goździki, chyba więcej tych drugich, a nuta bananów raczej takich nieco już przejrzałych, sporo słodyczy jeśli tak można powiedzieć o aromacie. W smaku goździk wyraźny, również nieco bardziej wysuwa się na pierwszy plan przed bananem. Goryczka na poziomie znikomych, ledwie wyczuwalna, o lekko metalicznym profilu. Nagazowanie rzeczywiście wysokie. Czyli wszystko typowe dla Hefeweizena, choć bez wielkiej jakości. Z drugiej strony nie jest to też piwo słabe.
Piwo mętne o pomarańczowej barwie, piana trwała pozostawia lacing. W aromacie goździk i banany. W smaku nieco ściągające. Słaby Weizen.

A pretty generic bland weizen, but very drinkable. It's probably most interesting to people who are used to barley beers and who want to just try a wheat beer, or at least that's how I came across it. It goes very well with food, and their tall glass looks pretty chic. It doesn't really have a lot in the way of the yeast scent, which I find to be a significant plus.

Decent, drinkable, well balanced, but again - bit dull and boring. Low on aroma with some wheaty maltiness, light citrus and yeast, light clove. Moderate to light sweetness with light bitterness.
One time try
Bottle.  It pours a cloudy orange gold with a thick white head that has very good retention. Its aroma has notes of clove and a light lemon fruitiness. Tasty.
Light bodied with some lemon sourness. Some banana and yeast but not strong. Needs a bit more body and less carbonation. Quite refreshing on a hot day but ultimately forgettable and rather bland.

Cerveja fácil de beber. Boa espuma branca e sabores médios de banana/trigo e ligeiro toque citríno. Boa carbonatação com agradável textura na boca. Corpo médio para uma weissbier.

Svijeto zuta, odnosno boja limuna. Blago mutno, sa debljom bijelom pjenom, srednje trajnom. Ne baš izražene arome, uglavnom citrusne i kvasac. Blage gorčine, jake karbonizacije, sa kraćim, blago gorkim finišom. Tekstura je vodena.

330ml bottle from the shop, drunk at home. Pours ever so slightly cloudy with a thin fast-settling frothy head, medium lacing, plenty of bead. Dirty golden colour. Very faint aromas of citrus, cereal, corn syrup and esters. Quite lively in the mouth with higher than average carbonation. Some mild cereal and floral honey flavours, a well judged dose of sweetness leading to a soft bitter finish. Overall, beautifully balanced and very refreshing, but more like an unfiltered lager than a weizen; where are the banana, bubblegum and cloves? Brewer, change your yeast!

Apparence : Blonde trouble, mousse blanche, rétention et carbonatation moyennes. 

Nez : Girofle, blé, intensité plutôt faible. 

Goût : Girofle, blé, aspect fruité d’orange, houblon végétal en finale. Léger goût de banane dans le sucre résiduel. 

Sensation : Corps plutôt mince, léger piquant de l’effervescence, courte durée. 

Bref : Pas des plus complexes, évidemment, bien agréable à boire. Si le clou de girofle se fait sentir d’abord en bouche, l’aspect fruité de l’orange et de la banane se construit bien au fil des gorgées. Somme toute intéressante malgré le manque de caractère au nez.

Bottle. Pours hazy copper with a rich rocky white head. Aroma of gentle wheat malt, slight clove, overripe banana. Taste is sweetish with a low bitterness. Flavors of wheat malt, slight grain, overripe banana, slight clove. Full body, slick texture, fizzy carbonation.
No significant flaws, though it feels pretty average.
Ok Weiss beer.  Golden color, more carbonation than most Weiss beers, somewhat bitter aftertaste.
33 cl bottle in Turkey. Rich orange smell in the beginning. Then , vanilla and pineapple tastes appears. Good alternative for weiss lovers.
Mętne, po pianie zostaje nikła koronka. Aromat bardzo słaby, ledwo czuć cokolwiek, trochę banana. W smaku wytrawne, na końcu nieprzyjemny, jakby chlebowy posmak. Słabo.

(Description appears to be a very literal translation). 500 ml bottle into weizen glass. The usual enormous head of foam. Aroma is light, with hints of malt and pepper. Eventually a cloudy amber beer appears with a million tiny bubbles. Taste is malt. Good body with little carbonation. Finish is more malt with slight fruit. Not the spice/fruit bomb I was expecting. Nice, easy-drinking. And as the description says 'A weissbier for all, those the unforgettable good taste love'.

500 ml bottle. cloudy yellow color with huge white head which won't staid long time. smells some wheat and grass with pineapple. taste are dominant wheat with some grass and grapefruit bitterness. aftertaste are medium bitterness with some grass and old pineapple. not surprised as here I'll should try another one some time and rait it another time. I think this one that I bought a bit old.
Butelka 0,5 l. Wypita 03.01.2018. Barwa nieco wyblakła, nie zachęcająca, klasycznie mętna. W aromacie nieco bananów. Smak znowu jakiś taki niezbyt wyrazisty. Trochę wodniste.
Bardzo porządne piwo pszeniczne. Wszystkie cechy gatunku, jedyne do czego się można przyczepić to nieco zbyt wodnisty smak.

btl. 50cl bb 05.2018. Fajna czteroczęściowa etykieta, większość kontry zapisana ukraińskimi znakami. Piwo o kolorze słomkowym, mało mętne. Bardzo obfita kremowa piana. Niby typowy weissbier, ale aromat kojarzy się z berlinerem a smak z saisonem. Zapach mocno kefirowy, zbożowy, fenole mało wyraźne. Średnie wysycenie - jak na weizena dość niskie. W smaku raczej wodniste, lekko kwaskowate, mdłe, z delikatnym bananem i przyprawami (biały pieprz). Posmak gwoździa i jakiegoś chwasta.

Piwo koloru zóltego, delikatnie metne (troche zbyt delikatnie jak na styl) z biala solidna piana. W aromacie banan, troche czuc slody i to by bylo na tyle. Ogólnie slaby ten zapaszek. Mild biscuits aroma with notes of banana shake. Sweet, but not really overwhelming. Cloudy golden in the glass with frothy head. OK, but kind a weird.

Poured from bottle. Malty and banana bread aromas. Cloudy golden colour. Slightly spiced with banana flavour. Short lived head. Bubbly mouth-feel. Kick back and relax with this great intro to wheat beer.
Pours hazy, golden colour with a tight head. Aroma of malts, bananas. Rather sweet. Taste is dry, banana notes, malty, grainy. Light bitterness. Drinkable and fine.

(500 ml bottle) Pours a murky golden beer, with vigorous medium carbonation, and a tight white head. The aroma is disappointingly weak for a Hefeweizen. There are subtle notes of fresh malt, wheat, banana, clove, lemon, mineral water, kiwi, sulphur, and cereal. It tastes fairly sweet, with a noble hop bitterness, and the palate is light and effervescent.

Overall, this Hefeweizen falls flat when compared to the likes of Franziskaner, or Weihenstephaner. The aroma is underwhelming, the palate is mediocre, and the note of sulphur just shouldn’t be there. From experience, however, Erdinger is much better served from the keg.

Pale and hazy golden/ orange color with a fluffy head of white foam. Copious amounts of cereal and an undercurrent of sweet orange juice. Has a bit of a sick vegetable finish that takes the experience down a few notches.

Ar: Banana, chalk, a hint of juicy fruit; cotton candy and peach skin; clove and black pepper, though quite soft; smooth, light maltiness. Ap: Golden and lightly hazy; very large white head with phenomenal retention, leaving a large airy cap of foam. T: Banana and black pepper up front; peach skin and soft malt, very light sweetness; soft, fresh maltiness; very low bitterness, no hop flavor; light malt, black pepper, and ripe peach on the finish. P: Medium-light body with high carbonation; very soft and pillowy on the palate; finish is dry. O: A spectacular German hefeweizen; hallmark flavors of banana, clove, peach, and fresh malt; great mouthfeel and looks superb in the glass!

Hazy golden beer with small white head. Aroma is wheat and banana. Taste is malty and little wheat as well. Light body, little bit watery, which ruined the taste a little bit. Otherwise descent smooth drinkable beer.

een van de betere German Hefeweizen; licht geel met vertroebelende tarwe erdoor en een dichte pakje plakschuim,fris fruitig geurend als van banaan,verse ananas en een beetje zoet van vanille, ook in de smaak vooral het fris fruitige daarna een bitter randje en een zacht zoetje
Piwo wypite jakiś czas temu. Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji, w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.

Plenty of malt/honey aroma that feels a bit out-of-place in hefeweizen; worryingly there isnt much beyond that other than a little wheat. Pours cloudy straw/yellow with large snowy head. In flavor similarly quite a lot of malt and grain, but there are regular hefeweizen qualities of yeast, cloves and wheat as well, though theyre rather muted. A bit watery. While it isnt a god-tier hefeweizen, its also definitely not something I regret drinking.

Bottle: 500 ml, Price: 1.25 eur 

Malonus kvapas, geras skonis..
500ml bottle from Costcutter, Reading. Light and watery, some wheat, grains, bready, yeasty, metallic. Pretty bland.

A decent enough Weiss beer from Erdinger. Hazy gold with a banana ester aroma. Quite malty in taste and refreshing enough Ina hot summer's day.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Can. Aroma is sour unripe banana. Flavor is slightly too phenolic and includes clove and banana. Smooth mouthfeel.

The can amazingly was better than the bottled version. 500ml can from Wellcome supermarket in Taipei ( Songren road ). Pours a beautiful pale gold. Thick white head. Nose was lemon and wheat and bubblegum. It was much smoother in a can.........I am thinking I actually got an authentic can from the source. It was very smooth and very drinkable. Taste was a mild, smooth sweet banana, wheat and light sweet fruit. If you see the mat finish can go for it. Indeed if I see these again I will buy a few.

Butelka do 01.2018. Wygląd - złote, lekko zamglone, z ładną biała pianą. Aromat - banany, lekkie nuty kwaskowate, może trochę przypraw. Smak - tutaj już goździki wyczuwalne, dalej banany, ale już w mniejszym stopniu, jakby kolendra, w tle przyprawy. Nasycenie średnie, goryczka niska.
Levadura, cereales y maltas de cereales. Oro brumoso, masiva, cremosa, cabeza blanca. Luz dulce. Más maltas dulces de grano y pan, caramelo, melaza, carbonatación media, cuerpo medio. Correcta.

50 cl. bottle @ Home.
Aroma: not very intense aromas of grains, cereals, wheat, straw, spices. Very subtle hints of banana, grapes, wine, fruits, bubble gum.
Appearance: light golden to yellow-straw color. Medium hazyness. Perfectly white foam made of assorted sized bubbles, mainly medium-to-big sized. Very high head thickness. Creamy foam. Very high retention. Low Brussels’ lacing.
Taste: low-to-medium sweetness, very low bitterness, no sourness. Very subtle flavors of grains, cereals, wheat, some spicy, citrusy and banana nuances. The balance is toward the malt sweetness, but it lacks a lot of flavor.
Palate: light body, very watery texture, low-to-medium carbonation, quite long slightly sweet finish of grains, cereals, wheat, with some fruity and spicy overtones. Not very pleasant mouthfeel.
Overall: good appearance. Not very intense aromas. I can’t find the style’s hallmark aromas of ripe banana. Too watery texture. Not very intense flavors neither. Quite drinkable but very far from a good Hefeweizen. Not too much flavor nor complexity, pretty boring.
One of my favourite weissbiers on the market. My go to weiss beer with a great taste. Everything about it is top class

Bottle.Hazy gold, thick,not too stable white head,some lacing.Aroma malty,some bananas,iron,bready. Taste thick,oily,not sweet. Aftertaste malty, bananas,some cloves,bubblegum. Could be better, the Hefeweizen aromas are not too pronounced.

500ml bottle. Pours cloudy orange with the usual big white fluffy head. Very grainy and cereal in the nose with bubblegum and a hint of banana and corriander. Some sharp carbonation and then a smooth chewy mouth feel. Taste is similar to the nose, but it’s a little bit blander than some of the better ones I’v tried. Some bitterness on the finish with this one. Overall it’s still hugely drinkable.
50cl bottle. fruity aroma with a very good head, refreshing and light taste. with a cloudy appearance and a good equilibrium. Good beer.

On tap in Edinburgh. Even by hefeweizen standards, this is cloying. It’s got a nice biscuit and spice aroma and initial taste, but the bubblegum esters and malt sweetness get overpowering pretty quickly.

Fräsch somrig öl. Disigt gul guldfärgad. Jäst, malt, skumbanan, sötma. Väldigt god

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
This light creamy hefeweizen is great with notes of banana, bubblegum and Clove that is creamy and very approachable for any beer drinker.
Leichte Zitrusnoten beim Antrunk, wenig bananig, leicht wässrig. Zu viel Kohlensäure macht dieses Weizen nicht sehr süffig!

Yeast, grain and cereal malts. Hazy gold, massive, creamy, white head. Light sweet. More sweet grain and bread malts, caramel, molasses, medium carbonation, medium bodied. Not the greatest macro Hefeweizen, a bit bland throughout. Bottle at BA lounge TXL, Berlin.

Bottle @ Het Patronaat, Roadburn 2017 - Tilburg - NL. Color: hazy white blond beer with medium carbonation and creamy white foam. Smell: wheat and banana notes. Sweet. Taste: medium body with wheat body balanced with banana. Easy drinkable. Aftertaste: banana and sweet notes, bubblegum. OK.

Klasyczna pszenica, lekko wodnista, w aromacie lekki banan, chleb pszenny, odrobinę cytrusowej kolendry. Dość wysokie wysycenie. Smak grający z aromatem, wszystkie nuty z aromatu są też w smaku. Minimalna goryczka

It pours hazy yellow with rocky white head. Good retention. Smell is banana esters, wheat malt and slight phenolic clove. Wheat malt and fruity esters are balanced with some spiciness. Light to medium bodied and effervescent on the palate. Semi dry finish. Very easy to drink.
Cloudy with a thick head that fades quickly. Strong yeast, bread and lemon aroma with a banana finish. A bit thin and unbalanced alcoholic in flavour for me... Little bitterness..
Above average good beer. Light, yet missing a bit of punch to make an impression.
Bottle. Cloudy pale orange. Great head. Weak aroma of bananas and some citrus fruits. Taste follows aroma. Medium carbonation. Thin and watery. Below average.

Pours a cloudy amber with a lively head. Drink looks like typical wheat beer with a lot of tiny bubbles rising to the surgace suggesting that this will indeed be quite a gassy drink. Aroma has hints of banana, vanilla and caramel and the taste is quite light and delicate with some pleasing wheatiness and a creamy texture.

Aroma: Subtle citrus and hay notes.
Appearance: Golden color with cloudy liquid and a frothy white head.
Taste: Light bitterness and medium sweet notes.
Palate: Medium body with creamy texture and soft carbonation. Fruity sweet finish (not a long memory).
Overall: An always fresh beer. To have in summer but to have in winter too.
One of the quintessential examples of the style of course. Easy to drink with mild fruitiness and relatively full body for the style.
Wypite jakis czas temu, ocena w ramach uzupelnienia profilu. Pyszna pszenica, bardzo ladny kolor

Birra dal colore giallo paglierino opaco. Schiuma bianca, fine e persistente. All’olfatto sentori fruttati di pesca gialla e crosta di pane. Al palato leggera con note di pane appena lievitato e frutta a polpa gialla. Una birra molto beverina che se lasciata riposare troppo diventa piatta e insignificante.
On tap. Pours hazy orange yellow. Lots of wholemeal bread, some peach, banana, pepper, cloves. Not a bad wheat beer example, but not at all exciting.

My favorite German beer to drink. Drank this on many times with my father after outings together on the golf course, or celebrations with my grandfather. Absolute must try. Enjoy 1 per evening to really relish the taste.

Hazy golden color with medium white head.
Aroma: wheat, light banana
Taste: light sweet
Bottle from the regal in Cambridge. Nose is citrus, faint banana, wheat, floral. Palate is a bit watery, banana, tart, bread. Ok.

0.5l bottle. Malty aroma, light banana notes, some spicy notes. Hazy golden color, thick white head. Malty aroma, spicy (corriander?) notes, light sour, light bitter. Light to medium body, thin texture, average carbonation and dry, light sour and bitter finish. Ok.

Bottle 0,5 L. Well chilled in the fridge. Poured into a 0,25 L beer glass. Pours hazy yellow color with a white head of average height. The nose of citrus and meadow grass. The taste is fresh, crisp and clean. The aftertaste is bread and citrus. A good quality commercial beer overall. USD2.44

Ar: Slodowo, pszenicznie, dobre banany, odrobina alko, bardzo dobra ziarnistosc, soczyscie, swiezo, wzorowy weizen. Wyg: metnawe, zolte, piana gruba, roznoziarnista, pieknie brudzi szklo. Sm: Slodowe, bardo ziarniste, pszenicznosc, zbyt wysoko wyscone, az troche przeszkadza, gladkie, cialo w porzadku, stylowe, dobre. Pos: pszenicznosc, ziaristosc, slodowosc, niezle, leciutka slodowa goryczka.

Bottle pour at an espresso bar in Koln. Commonshawn, samalito, dubtully, and rosskyle present but choosing coffee over beer. Questionable. Large standard hefeweisen glass. On the lighter golden side for a hefeweisen but still shows off a tendency to be hazy. Full finger white head. Aroma of a light banana with wheat notes. Little but of a spice quality as well. Taste is pretty standard but mouthfeel on the thinner side for the style. Banana characteristics. Feels like a great beer for the summer but it’s not distinguishing itself from others. Good changeup from the many kolsch beers consumed during our Koln stay.
Pas vraiment fan de cette blanche allemande, la robe n’est pas très belle et les arômes sont peu prononcés. Tout juste passable.
Bottle at home. Pours hazy light brown with big white head. Aroma is wheat and banana. Taste has malts and wheat. Okay.

500ml bottle. Hazy golden with one finger white head. Aroma of light yeast, citrus and wheat a light spicy touch. Taste is predominantly sweet wheat with light yesstiness, citrus, banana and a minimal clove touch. Smooth medium mouthfeel, light carbonation and light wheat aftertaste.

Poured from a 50cl bottle at home. Orange-gold, white head. Wheat and grain, and a slight banana flavour. Medium body...I think, as carbonation is truly lively, which I don’t find too bad, but it does dominate most feeling of texture.
Hmmm. Brewed to be inoffensive unfortunately. Soft aroma of wheat and malt. Soft mouthfeel. Just soft really. No real distinguishing features. Drinkable but boring. The Dunkel is far better.

500 ml bottle.
Aroma brings fruit and yeast with a slight sweetness to the table. Flavourwise it doesn’t impress. Slight fruit, mostly banana and a dry bitterness that just doesn’t taste nice, it tastes off in a way. Slight acidity in the taste as well. Somewhat creamy mouthfeel but it only lasts a few seconds.
Not a fan.
Aromat bananowy. Barwa złota, mętna, piana średnia, drobnopęcherzykowa. Smak banany, cytrusy, pszenica. Goryczka niska.
Classic weizen but the aroma and taste are not so powerfull in this beer. This makes it a bit boring

Subdued smell f banana. Bready.
hazy golden body with creamy white head but no lacing and fading quickly.
Sweet and slightly dry bitter body.
Medium body. Medium high carbonation.
Ok
Backlog. Przenoszenie ocen z innego serwisu, z czasów przed założeniem konta na ratebeer

So lets try this “true classic of Bavarian wheat beer culture”, as stated on their own website!

They say that it really should be drank from a Weizen glass for proper usage, but hell I can only go on what I have…….a normal glass stein, but its good enough for me.

Also, I must say I do love the logo of the company. Really colourful with the wheat symbol surrounded by striking red and blue colours spelling out the name of Erdinger Weissbier. 

On pour there is a good bit of carbonation, noisy bubbles resulting in a pretty big decent sized frothy head. Vibrant and alive!
A very pale golden colour.

Turns a bit hazy looking after a while.

Head reduces in size but retains a little bit

Got a lot in the bottle, a lot of bang for the buck! 

Faint smell, of yeast, not much to smell, uninspiring 

On taste, got a really refreshing nice big mouthful, creamy and smooth. A nice start

Big nice mouthfuls, but no real distinct tastes, creamy, but not bad

Smooth and crisp enough to saviour, and nice for a weissbier. Nice, I liked it

Wouldn’t say there is a whole lot of taste.

Can’t really feel the alcohol
Tastes of light malt. Light malt, some fruits and of course the wheat

Liked it a lot, nice, very easy to drink, not much taste, but filling, and quite smooth. Overall this isn’t a bad beer, but perhaps a bit boring for the style and not enough strong standout flavours to satisfy the Weissbier fans………

Buena cerveza de trigo con un sabor diferente a las habituales. Aquí no destaca tanto el sabor a trigo de otras cervezas como pueden ser la Franziskaner o Paulaner. Aquí se nota un sabor a malta de cebada en mayor medida.
Posee un aroma y sabor muy suaves y un gusto en el paladar interesante.
Es una buena cerveza de trigo, pero ni mucho menos de las mejores.

I think I should have chilled the beer a little before opening. 
Golden and almost clear beer. Three finger head that fairly rapidly disappears and no lacing. 
On the nose is wheat and yeast. Subtle banana notes 
Lively and quite smooth in the mouth with a good carbonation those yeast flavours and sweet hay grassy notes, some floral notes. 
Whilst I did enjoy this beer it wasn't as I expected, no banana or cloves or spice.

On tap pours out a hazy straw color topped with a fluffy white head. Nose is fruit wheat some sweetness. Taste is more of the fruit east and wheat.

500ml bottle from Systembolaget. Hazy golden, medium size white head, good lacing. Mild fruity aroma, citrus, floral and grassy. Smooth mouthfeel, medium-bodied, medium carbonated. Citrus fruity taste, mild peppery, cloves, bread, grapes, some banana notes. Crisp finish.
Backlog, ocena przepisana z untappd, w ramach uzupełniania profilu na ratebeer.

Not your normal weissbier in taste. There’s no trace of banana, bubblegum or clove in this one. Deceptively strong though, I usually end up mangled after a few of these, especially when its on draught. Wetherspoons pubs in the UK usually have this on draught or in a bottle and its my drink of choice if I’m ever in one of their pubs along with Tucher’s weissbier.

Very nice aroma and taste: it’s supposed to be banana & citrus, I don’t make the association but it’s both very refreshing and soft at the same time. Aftertaste slightly astringent but very nice. Lively carbonation. First time I tried a Weissbier but won’t be the last.
classic german wheat beer, nice colour ,creamy foam, nice floral and fruit aromas, wheat taste , and nice aftertaste.
typical weiss beer. The taste and aromas are as they should be in weiss beer. Fruity and smooth leaves a great aftertaste.

Not bad, but not up to the same standard of other hefes I’ve had, not much banana/clove flavour.

From the bottle, at Bowling Seventies, San Marino. Pours golden, pretty clear for a weisse. Aroma has banana and bread. Body is tendentially light. Taste is sweet, with some sparkleness. Leaves a little bit too much sweetness in the finish.

Overall, quite nice and refreshing. Lovely balanced hefe.

Medium head, light golden colour, lightly cloudy. Aroma of bananas and clover. Lightly sour with bitter aftertaste, light body, long finish, lively.

Bue 7 mois avant DLC aux Canaries. Biere blonde trouble avec gros col de mousse de fines bulles blanches a tres bonne tenue. Carbonation impressionnante. Pas d’arome detecte. Erdinger is the largest wheat beer brewery in the world. Their signature weissbier is typically available almost everywhere but its a fine example of what a nice hefeweizen should be like. I had it from cask in a large Erdinger weizen glass, chilled to around 0 degrees. Colour is light orange and it has a smooth white head. Aroma is banana, yeast, with some zest. In terms of taste and palate, it?s very smooth. There are some banana notes but not as much as people make out. There?s a bread-y presence as well and definitely some nice pumpkin hints as well as butternut squash. The finish is fresh and very sharp. It?s less pure than weihenstephaner or Franziskaner but I enjoy the overall taste of this more than the aforementioned adversaries.

Para mim é a melhorar do mundo no seu género. Adoro! Quero continuar a beber.

Una buena cerveza blanca. Muy buen color y sabor. Refrescante aunque no la aconsejo muy fria ya que perdería aroma.
